decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with drawing - Proposed Site Plan, Floor Plan and Section A-A drawing no.TP/625/03 and Proposed Elevation drawing no.TP/625/04
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7C and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg 18), policies D1, D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) - Section 12 and 16.
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing single storey rear extension)
